TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SoapAttributeOverrides extends System.Object

summary.span: 允许您在使用 将对象序列化或反序列化为编码的 SOAP 时重写应用于属性、字段和类的特性。

span.span: Allows you to override attributes applied to properties, fields, and classes when you use an to serialize or deserialize an object as encoded SOAP.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类启用重写序列化的一组对象的默认方式。The class enables an to override the default way of serializing a set of objects. 重写以这种方式序列化有两个用途： 首先，您可以控制和增强的 DLL 中找到的对象的序列化，即使到源，则不能访问第二，您可以创建一组可序列化类，但序列化多个方法中的对象。Overriding serialization in this way has two uses: first, you can control and augment the serialization of objects found in a DLL, even if you do not have access to the source; second, you can create one set of serializable classes, but serialize the objects in multiple ways. 例如，而不是序列化的类实例成员作为 XML 元素，可以序列化它们作为 XML 特性，从而得到更高效的文档中传输。For example, instead of serializing members of a class instance as XML elements, you can serialize them as XML attributes, resulting in a more efficient document to transport. 在创建后，创建使用方法的类。After you create a , you create an using the method of the class. 将生成的对象作为参数传递构造函数。Pass the resulting object as an argument to the constructor. 得到使用包含的数据重写来控制如何序列化对象的属性。The resulting uses the data contained by the to override attributes that control how objects are serialized. 若要实现此目的，包含一系列重写的对象类型以及与每个重写的对象类型相关联。To accomplish this, the contains a collection of the object types that are overridden, as well as a associated with each overridden object type. 每个包含一组适当的控制如何序列化每个字段、 属性或类的属性对象。Each contains an appropriate set of attribute objects that control how each field, property, or class is serialized. 创建和使用的过程如下所示：The process for creating and using a is as follows: 1. 创建 。Create a . 2. 创建一个属性对象，它适合于正在重写的对象。Create an attribute object that is appropriate to the object being overridden. 例如，若要重写字段或属性，创建，使用新的派生类型。For example, to override a field or property, create a , using the new, derived type. 您可以根据需要分配一个新重写基类的属性名称或命名空间。You can optionally assign a new that overrides the base class's attribute name or namespace. 3. 将属性对象添加到相应属性或集合。Add the attribute object to the appropriate property or collection. 例如，将设置的属性对象传递给并指定要重写的成员名称。For example, you would set the property of the object to the and specify the member name that is being overridden. 4. 创建 。Create a . 5. 添加到使用方法。Add the to the using the method. 如果对象被重写，只需指定重写的对象的类型。If the object being overridden is a , you need only specify the type of the overridden object. 但如果您要重写字段或属性，则必须指定重写的成员的名称。But if you are overriding a field or property, you must also specify the name of the overridden member. 6. 创建使用方法的类。Create an using the method of the class. 7. 构造时，传递到构造函数。When constructing the , pass the to the constructor. 8. 使用生成要序列化或反序列化的类对象。Use the resulting to serialize or deserialize the class objects. ## Examples 下面的示例序列化类名为`Group`。The following example serializes a class named `Group`. 序列化`GroupName`并`IgnoreThis`字段和的成员`GroupType`枚举将被重写。The serialization of the `GroupName` and `IgnoreThis` fields and the members of the `GroupType` enumeration are overridden. 在中`CreateOverrideSerializer`方法，已创建，并为每个重写的成员或枚举、 一个设置，并添加到相应的属性创建。In the `CreateOverrideSerializer` method, a is created, and for each overridden member or enumeration, a is created with the appropriate property set and added to the . 使用创建，并且用于创建的重写默认序列化。An is created using the , and that is used to create the that overrides the default serialization. [!code-cpp[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/CPP/soapover.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/CS/soapover.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/VB/SoapOver.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含的 attribute 对象会导致的联合重写的一组对象及其默认序列化行为。The contains a union of attribute objects that cause the to override its default serialization behavior for a set of objects. 选择要将放入的属性对象，取决于您想要覆盖特定行为。You choose the attribute objects to place in the , depending on the particular behaviors you want to override. 例如，将类成员序列化的 XML 元素形式，默认情况下。For example, the serializes a class member as an XML element by default. 如果你想要序列化为 XML 特性的成员，将创建，将其分配给的属性，并添加到。If you want the member to be serialized as an XML attribute instead, you would create a , assign it to the property of a , and add the to the . 使用方法中添加到。Use the method to add the to the . 使用此重载添加，其中包含。Use this overload to add a that contains a . 因为重写序列化的类，不需要指定类的成员，若要替代，只有类的类型。Because the overrides the serialization of a class, you need not specify a member of the class to override, only the type of the class. ## Examples 下面的示例序列化类名为`Group`。The following example serializes a class named `Group`. 序列化`GroupName`并`IgnoreThis`字段和的成员`GroupType`枚举将被重写。The serialization of the `GroupName` and `IgnoreThis` fields and the members of the `GroupType` enumeration are overridden. 在中`CreateOverrideSerializer`方法，已创建，并为每个重写的成员或枚举、 一个设置，并添加到相应的属性创建。In the `CreateOverrideSerializer` method, a is created, and for each overridden member or enumeration, a is created with the appropriate property set and added to the . 使用创建，并且用于创建的重写默认序列化。An is created using the , and that is used to create the that overrides the default serialization. [!code-cpp[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/CPP/soapover.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/CS/soapover.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/VB/SoapOver.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含的 attribute 对象会导致的联合重写的一组对象及其默认序列化行为。The contains a union of attribute objects that cause the to override its default serialization behavior for a set of objects. 选择要将放入的属性对象，取决于您想要覆盖特定行为。You choose the attribute objects to place in the , depending on the particular behaviors you want to override. 例如，将类成员序列化的 XML 元素形式，默认情况下。For example, the serializes a class member as an XML element by default. 如果你想要改为序列化为 SOAP 特性的成员，将创建，将其分配给的属性，并添加到。If you want the member to be serialized as a SOAP attribute instead, you would create a , assign it to the property of a , and add the to the . 使用方法中添加到。Use the method to add the to the . 使用此方法时包含， ， ，或。Use this method when the contains either a , , , or . ## Examples 下面的示例序列化类名为`Group`。The following example serializes a class named `Group`. 序列化`GroupName`并`IgnoreThis`字段和的成员`GroupType`枚举将被重写。The serialization of the `GroupName` and `IgnoreThis` fields and the members of the `GroupType` enumeration are overridden. 在中`CreateOverrideSerializer`方法，已创建，并为每个重写的成员或枚举、 一个设置，并添加到相应的属性创建。In the `CreateOverrideSerializer` method, a is created, and for each overridden member or enumeration, a is created with the appropriate property set and added to the . 使用创建，并且用于创建的重写默认序列化。An is created using the , and that is used to create the that overrides the default serialization. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此重载以返回其中包含重写的特性， ， ，或。Use this overload to return a that contains attributes that override a , , , or . 您还可以返回，其中包含的使用的默认值重写。You can also return a that contains the override of a default value that uses a . 如果包含，则必须使用指定仅重写的类型的重载。If the contains a , you must use the overload that specifies only the overridden type. ## Examples 下面的示例创建用来重写的实例的序列化`Group`类。The following example creates a used to override the serialization of an instance of the `Group` class. 此示例还使用属性来检索，用于指定序列化会重写。The example also uses the property to retrieve the that is used to specify how the serialization is being overridden.
